> I do have to wonder though, does anyone make use of the Assert class' 
> static nature?


I have written other Assert classes (like ArrayAssert) that take 
advantage of the static assert.  It should be possible to make 
AssertArray extends Assert but you may have casting problems (as Arrays 
are also Objects).  Although I never tried the latter solution, since I 
decided to stick with the static nature.

-Vladimir
